A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Personally\, I would not give this movie a perfect five star rating\, but because of all the unnecessary sh*t that's going down with this movie\, I think it's necessary to help improve the audience score. I mean\, seriously? This is a fine movie. sure some aspects aren't perfect\, but that seems like the only thing stupid Star Wars fans need these days. Just because one f*cking thing is off with this movie\, doesn't mean you have to go on a rampage about it! I think that in the end\, if you weren't nitpicking every aspect of it\, this is a fun\, entertaining addition to the Star Wars franchise.
